title: The Dream Boat
description: It all leads to the emotional anchor ceremony. Will our captivating captain find her first mate, or will it be man overboard?
quote: Guess I’ll just wait ’til one of them blows me out of the water.
altHero: a man and a woman cheek to cheek and holding hands on the deck of a boat
alt1: blonde woman at the bow of a boat wearing a captain’s hat
alt2: blonde woman sitting on a barrel with a casula dude playing an accordion
alt3: three guys on the boat, one wearing a floating tube around his waist, one is shirtless and buff, and one is dressed like an English author
alt4: three buff dudes in tank tops making pouty faces
